text:
- Sitel Group is one of the
largest customer experience
providers around the globe
to provide solutions and products.

Our 160,000 associates
empower our clients' brands

through meaningful connections
with their customers.

We manage over eight
million contacts a day

through voice, chat,
email, and social media.
- With the pandemic being global,
one of the things that really struck us

is the sheer size of the
problem that we faced.

It's not just going to be
a section of our associates
that needed to go home.
It's going to be a lot of people globally

and we needed to use a provider
that really could offer

that scale that we could send
several tens of thousands
of people home at very short notice.

One of the things that we
recognized was AWS's ability

to actually provide
the resources we needed
at very short notice.

- WorkSpaces also
allowed to attain clients
that were previously just closed to us.
Our ability to deliver during the pandemic

just gave us such credibility
in the marketplace.

We literally saw attrition
of our agents reduce
and agent satisfaction increased,
including client performance.
In the end for our customers,

they want to know that
they've got a partner
in Sitel Group that can be there for them
to be able to be there when they need it
and how they need provision,

to have the flexibility
to provide their tools
on their particular image
no matter where that agent might live,

no matter how difficult it
be to get to that agent,
and WorkSpaces helped us achieve that.
(gentle music)
